burgers.name: The Black Chicken
burgers.description: Indulge in the tantalizing 'Black Chicken' burger - a flavor-packed delight with a black bun, crispy bacon, melted cheddar cheese, and a creamy mayo drizzle. A perfect harmony of boldness and taste awaits!

burgers.name: The BLT Burger
burgers.description: Experience the ultimate BLT burger: a juicy patty topped with crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and zesty mayo. A mouthwatering twist on the classic BLT sandwich, packed with flavor and satisfaction!

burgers.name: The BunDrop Special
burgers.description: Double the delight with our hearty burger featuring twin patties and a tantalizing hamburger dressing. Sink your teeth into this flavor-packed masterpiece, bursting with juicy goodness and a signature sauce that will leave you craving more!

burgers.name: The Double Delight
burgers.description: Indulge in the ultimate flavor explosion with our double patty burger, topped with savory cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, and fiery red peppers. Each bite is a symphony of mouthwatering goodness, combining juicy beef, rich cheese, smoky bacon, and a touch of spicy sweetness for an unforgettable burger experience!

burgers.name: The Spicy Buffalo
burgers.description: Savor the boldness of our double patty burger, layered with melted cheddar cheese and drizzled with zesty buffalo sauce. Every bite delivers a harmonious blend of succulent beef, creamy cheese, and a tangy kick that will ignite your taste buds. Get ready to experience burger bliss like never before!

burgers.name: The Meatsplosion
burgers.description: Prepare for meat lover's paradise with our towering burger featuring three juicy patties, melty cheese, fiery chili, fresh tomatoes, and our signature special sauce. Each bite delivers a carnivorous delight, with layers of succulent meat, bold flavors, and with our special BunDrop-sauce

burgers.name: The Onion
burgers.description: Experience burger bliss with our mouthwatering creation featuring a juicy patty with gooey American cheese, and crispy fried onions. Each bite is a symphony of flavors, combining juicy beef, creamy cheese, and the irresistible crunch of perfectly fried onions. Prepare for a tantalizing burger experience that will leave you craving more!

burgers.name: The Plant Burger
burgers.description: Indulge in the ultimate vegetarian delight: a plant-based burger featuring plant-based beef, smoky plant-based bacon, and melty vegan cheese. Experience the perfect harmony of flavors, with a juicy patty, sizzling bacon alternative, and creamy dairy-free cheese. This plant-powered burger is a delicious, guilt-free choice that satisfies both your cravings and ethical choices!

burgers.name: The Spicy Buffalo
burgers.description: Discover veggie perfection with our black bean patty burger. Savory black bean goodness, complemented by a medley of flavorful toppings, including melted cheddar cheese. Indulge in this meatless marvel that satisfies both taste buds and values, delivering a scrumptious plant-based delight you won't be able to resist!
